children.name: I have specific criteria new members need to have to join my club.
I believe a specific demographic can fulfill my club's needs.
PB1 hope younger members, especially undergrates can join to keep the club alive.
She doesn't publicize ISU in CMU Facebook freshman-only groups.
The current recruitment effort has been mainly focused on undergraduates.
There're around 500 mechanical engineering students in total, who are the recruiting target of ASME.
